description: This file defines the interface for a PKI entity, including functions for key management, certificate creation, encoding, and cryptographic operations. It appears to be part of a PKI implementation and includes declarations for handling certificates, keys, and related cryptographic data.

methods.name: InitPKIEntityAPIs
methods.description: Initializes the PKI entity APIs for the given object handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityRemove
methods.description: Removes or cleans up the PKI entity associated with the object handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityRemoveEntityCert
methods.description: Removes the entity's certificate.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetCACount
methods.description: Returns the total count of CA certificates in the chain.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetCAByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves a CA certificate handle by index.

methods.name: PKIEntityCreatePKCS10
methods.description: Creates a PKCS#10 certificate signing request handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityCreatePKCS10Encoding
methods.description: Generates the encoding for a PKCS#10 request.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetEntityCert
methods.description: Retrieves the entity's certificate handle.

methods.name: PKIEntitySetCertHandle
methods.description: Sets the certificate handle for the entity.

methods.name: PKIEntitySetIssuedCert
methods.description: Sets the issued certificate encoding.

methods.name: PKIEntitySetPrivateKeyInfo
methods.description: Sets the private key encoding information.

methods.name: PKIEntityExportInfo
methods.description: Exports the certificate and private key info, returning encodings and their lengths.

methods.name: PKIEntityExportToFile
methods.description: Exports certificate and private key info to specified files.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetKeyType
methods.description: Returns the key type of the cryptographic handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetKeyLength
methods.description: Returns the length of the key in bits.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetPublicKey
methods.description: Retrieves the public key from the handle.

methods.name: PKIEntitySignData
methods.description: Signs data using the cryptographic handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityVerify
methods.description: Verifies a signature against the data.

methods.name: PKIEntityDecryptData
methods.description: Decrypts data using the cryptographic handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityEncryptData
methods.description: Encrypts data using the cryptographic handle.

methods.name: PKIEntityIssueCert
methods.description: Issues a certificate to a user entity, potentially as a CA.

methods.name: PKIEntityGetName
methods.description: Gets the name of the entity.

methods.name: PKIEntitySetName
methods.description: Sets the name of the entity.
